custodian_tips.title: How to use credits in custodian wallet?
custodian_tips.description:
1. Asking a question costs 1 credit.
 2. Upvoting or downvoting an answer earns 1 credit.
 3. No Gas fee.

external_tips.title: How to use credits in external wallet?
external_tips.description:
1. Participating in QnA3 official activities can earn credits, and may receive airdrops in the future.
2. Transferring from custodian wallet to external wallet will be supported soon.

connect_tips: Connect your wallet and receive 20 credits instantly
